title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fried fish according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fried fish: Fish is considered one of the main meals that everyone wants to eat because it is full of nutritional benefits and maintains and supports health on an ongoing basis. There are several ways to prepare it, such as frying. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish? Fried fish in a dream is a serious blessing for the dreamer and a significant increase in his money, in addition to a feeling of satisfaction with his circumstances after the dream. The expansion of a person’s scope of living may represent the acquisition of a large inheritance that makes him He is wealthy and enjoys a lot of luxury and comfort. If a woman faces a lot of bad things as a result of her husband’s difficult nature, she will soon be happy and will gain psychological stability and comfort in her relationship with him. As for a childless woman watching raw fish, it is an expression of God’s response to her prayers and his provision for her to have children soon, God willing. God. If the husband dies, and the woman suffers from many bad circumstances, this will come to pass, and the evil around her and her children will disappear, and God knows best. If a son sees in his dream that his father gives him fried fish to eat, then this father will help him in a certain project with his money to recover and grow. Interpretation Dream of fried fish by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a lot of fried fish in a dream brings him many benefits and benefits that provide him with joy and pleasure. This fish confirms that the dreamer gets all the money from halal sources and does not follow any suspicious path to gain money or power. If a woman finds it In her dream while she is happy, Ibn Sirin confirms that she will become pregnant soon and this pregnancy will be free of the difficulties and severe pain that a pregnant woman may face. Goodness dominates a person, and his life becomes full of gain and gain, whether from an emotional standpoint or from his material conditions that he saw after the loss in the days. Previous. Ibn Sirin expresses a specific topic related to this dream, which is that if the person is married and shares it with someone in the dream, then the wife will cheat with someone close to him in reality. One of the connotations of eating fried fish is that it is a sign that God has accepted the dreamer’s request and that he will give him a lot. In the coming days. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that fried fish in general is a sign of the dreamer’s halal profit and an increase in this money In the following days, in large quantities. If someone eats this fish while it is spoiled or full of salty taste, then he will fall into a great disaster from which he will emerge with many losses, and God knows best. If a lot of fried fish falls on the dreamer from the sky while he is standing underneath it, the dream will become one of the dreams. Unfortunately for him, it is a sign that he is going through great fears that afflict the person with deep sadness. Imam Al-Sadiq proves that eating a fish is evidence of happiness in general, but if it is full of thorns, there are many obstacles in the life of the dreamer, and some enemies may be able to harm him. The joke

title: 11+ Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream White cats in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about cats according to Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of dreams Cats in a dream portend misfortune if they are chased or killed in a dream. A person's dream of a cat meowing is an indication of the presence of a treacherous friend and the dreamer must be careful. A dream about a person scratching a cat is evidence of getting rid of the enemy and defeating him. Seeing a clean, cute cat inside a dream It announces something that will be beautiful at first, but it hides many unpleasant things behind it. A dream about a black cat is a sign of good luck. Seeing a white cat is evidence that the dreamer is an arrogant and arrogant person. Seeing cats in a dream by Nabulsi A dead cat is evidence of the survival of the enemy and victory over him in the near future. A dream about cats in a dream is evidence of psychological comfort. Seeing a large number of kittens in a dream can mean happiness and good news. A married woman may become pregnant and give birth to children soon. Seeing cats alone in a dream A girl's dream of a cat in a dream is evidence of a new man entering her life and a love story between them. A girl's vision of cats and who really loves cats may indicate that she is engaged to a man who loves her and her family very much and will be happy with him. A cat in a dream indicates bad friends. A female cat shows the beauty of this girl. A dream about cats for a married woman in a dream A married cat in a dream indicates the differences that occur between her and her husband. A cat chasing a woman in a dream is evidence that people focus on her life in a way that causes anxiety and fear. A dream of a conflict between cats is evidence of the emergence of problems in their lives. Black cats in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she is preparing food for cats, this indicates good health for her and the fetus. If a pregnant woman is injured in a dream by cats, this indicates poor health for herself and the fetus. Many cats in a dream of pregnancy are evidence of the presence of a male child. Cats A black woman in a pregnant woman's dream is evidence of unwanted events occurring to her. Feeding a cat in a dream is evidence of the lawful money that she will get. Black cats are evidence of the presence of a man A deceiver in her life. The meaning of a dream about cats in a man's dream A young man who sees a dream about cats, this indicates the problems he is in. If a young man attacks a cat in a dream, this indicates his ability to deal with problems. Seeing a cat in the house is a sign of peace and psychological comfort. White cats are evidence of saving money. If a young man sees himself playing with a cat, this indicates the return of an important person from a trip. Many cats in a dream are evidence of the problems the dreamer faces at work. If a man sees cats attacking him, this indicates unpleasant events he is going through. A detailed interpretation of seeing a cat Seeing a hungry cat in a dream is a sign of a problem and danger in which the dreamer falls. Seeing cats chasing in a dream is a sign of happy news and good events that the dreamer will experience. Keeping cats away from the house is evidence of getting rid of the problems the fortuneteller faces for a period of time. Seeing a black cat's tail indicates good luck. Kittens in dreams

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a mother in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The mother in the fingers has many connotations and meanings for people and makes them strongly desire to get to know her, and this varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer sees the mother, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations of scholars regarding this. The topic, so let us read the following. Mother in a dreamIf the dreamer sees the mother in his dream, this is a sign of the abundant blessing that will enter his life in the coming period. In the event that the dreamer sees the mother in his dream, this expresses the tremendous achievements that he will achieve in his works. When one sees His mother is in good condition during his sleep, as this indicates removing the obstacles that stood in his way and achieving his goal with ease. The dreamer’s vision in a dream of a mother with a very bad appearance symbolizes many problems and troubles that he will suffer from. The mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision To the mother in a dream, indicating that he is suffering at that time from many worries that make him think about the past and his warm memories. If someone sees that his mother is scolding him severely in his dream, this is a sign that he was doing something wrong at that time and making her dissatisfied with him at all. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that his mother is treating him very kindly, this expresses the good events that will happen in his life in the coming days. The dreamer seeing his mother smiling at him in his dream symbolizes his ability to achieve many things that he has dreamed of for a long time. The mother in a dream according to Nabulsi will be interpreted The dreamer Nabulsi who sees his mother in a dream giving birth to him again is a sign that he will obtain a lot of money that will contribute greatly to the stability of his financial circumstances. If one sees his mother in his dream, this is a sign of the abundant blessings that he will enjoy in his life as a result of his fairness to her and his willingness to please her. If the dreamer sees during his sleep the death of his mother, this indicates many problems that will disturb his rest in the coming days. Seeing the dreamer in a dream with his mother smiling at him symbolizes the good news that will reach him in the coming days. A mother in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees Her mother in her dream, this is a sign that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from someone who suits her well and she will be very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees his mother in her dream and kisses her by the hand, this means that he has achieved many things that he has dreamed of for a long time. Seeing your mother’s daughter asleep and sick Very symbolizes many obstacles that she will face as she moves towards achieving her goals. Therefore, the dreamer’s dream of the mother’s death and her crying is a sign of the many problems that she will face in her life. A mother in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream with a very happy mother is a sign that she is at that moment She was carrying a child in her stomach, but she does not know it yet. If the dreamer sees the mother crying during her sleep, this is a sign of the many disagreements that prevailed in her relationship with her husband at that time and causing the situation to deteriorate between them. If the dreamer sees her kissing her mother’s hand in her dream, this means It will improve dramatically

title: I dreamed that I found a lot of eggs

preview.html: I dreamed that I found a lot of eggs in a dream by seeing the website roy2a.com. Eggs contain many nutrients, the most important of which is protein, along with many vitamins and minerals that are mainly beneficial and needed by the human body. Today, through this article, we will present to you: I dreamed that I found eggs. Many great interpreters follow us, such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other interpretation scholars. Dreams, according to the status of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I found a lot of eggs in a dream. I see in a dream that I find and collect eggs. It indicates achieving a goal in the dreamer’s life after a lot of effort and effort. Searching for eggs and collecting them in a woman’s dream indicates the approaching date of her wedding. And God knows best. Seeing a student finding eggs in a dream indicates that he will achieve great success and distinction in his life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a motorcycle in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a lot of eggs in a dream indicates the dreamer’s fear of losing money and his willingness not to. Spending. Seeing a hen laying eggs in a dream. Show that the fortuneteller will soon give birth to a son, and God knows best. Boiled eggs in a dream. It indicates the end of all worries and sorrows in the dreamer’s life. Seeing in a dream eating immature eggs. Cue the viewer getting the forbidden money, and God knows best. Read also: Interpretation of a vision. Eggs in a dreamInterpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a single womanSeeing individual raw eggs in a dreamIt shows that there will be many crises in the near future. Buying eggs in one dream announces an abundance of goodness and blessings in her life. Collecting eggs in one dream shows that the coming period of her life will be full of goodness And food for her. Boiled eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates marriage to a person who suits her and with whom she will live a happy life. Read also: Interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married white woman in a dream indicates very good and abundant food for her and her family. Raw eggs in a married woman’s dream says that she is an extravagant woman who spends a lot of money on useless things. Seeing a married woman breaking eggs in a dream indicates that she will face many problems and fears in the coming period. Buying eggs in a married woman’s dream says that she will achieve great profits and gains from her business. Special.Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman with eggs in a dream announces that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. The yolk of eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will be exposed to some health problems in the near future. Eating eggs during pregnancy: It indicates that she and her child will be in good health after an operation. Birth. Read also: Interpretation of seeing boiled eggs in a dream. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a man’s dream. Seeing a white man in a dream. It indicates that God will bless him with a lot of goodness and sustenance. Eating boiled eggs in a man’s dream. It indicates that God will alleviate his distress and remove his worries. Collecting eggs is a solution.

title: Interpretation of running in a dream

preview.html: To learn more about the interpretation of the dream of running in a dream for each person in detail, follow the rest of the article on our website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of the vision of running in a dream about a single girl. Running in a dream after an unknown man with one girl. A sign that he is pursuing something and wants to achieve it, and this will come true. The goal if he sees that he has caught this person. While if he dreams that he is running after animals, then he has an unmarried girl. The dream indicates the pursuit of profit and gaining money. If he runs after a horse in a dream, then he only has one girl. The vision may indicate the goodness that It will come to him soon, thanks to Almighty God. To see yourself running for something you fear in an unmarried girl’s dream. It indicates her fear of things related to her future and they may be things that worry her about something that will come true. Interpretation of seeing yourself running to get away from someone you know in a dream. The vision showed that it She does not accept the presence of this person in her life. The dream of running behind a train refers to one girl. However, she thinks a lot about matters related to marriage or engagement, which is her job, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a woman running in a dream for a woman Married When a married woman dreams that she is chasing her husband. It is an indication of striving to achieve his satisfaction and working to provide all his services. If she sees that she is running away from her husband in a dream with a married woman. The vision may indicate the great responsibility that her husband left for her while she was awake. While seeing a black dog running In a dream of a married woman. The vision indicated that there is an evil man trying to catch her. Interpretation of the vision of running by an unknown woman and she had a frightening appearance in a dream of a married woman. It is a sign that there are fears dominating their lives and they must be eliminated soon, God willing. One day I dreamed of running away from something I was afraid of in the dream of a married woman. This is an indication that some negative changes will occur in reality, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams that she is managing and supporting her children, she will do many things that will protect her children from the fears that may control them. Interpretation of a dream about running In a man’s dream and its meaningWhen a married man sees that he is running away from an unknown subject, and at the end of the road he finds a person in a dream. It will in reality solve all the crises that he is going through. Running in different directions for a married man in a dream. It indicates some obstacles that he is going through in his life, and God The highest and most knowledgeable. While if a married man sees that he is running out of fear for something he has. The vision indicates that he is afraid of various matters related to his future life or career. If a married man believes that he is running after an unknown woman in a dream. It is a sign that he is searching for things in Misplaced. Interpretation of seeing running after many different animals in a married man’s dream. It indicates getting rid of some things that were in his life and putting him in a constant state of fear. You dream that there is an unknown person running after a married man in a dream. It indicates the presence of a preoccupation. By seeking sustenance and legitimate gains. Read also: Interpretation of Ahla

title: Interpretation of seeing geese in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing geese in a dream via the website roy2a.com. Seeing geese in a dream means obtaining money, a prestigious job, marital and family stability, hearing good news, as well as pregnancy for a married woman and giving birth to a daughter for a pregnant woman, and providing interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and other interpreters of ancient and modern times, so follow us on his website to find out the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing geese in a dream indicates a lot of goodness, joy and pleasure. Seeing black geese indicates bad news and sadness. If a married man sees that he has measles in a dream, it indicates that he will obtain a prestigious job and financial stability. Seeing goose eggs in a dream indicates hearing good news and an abundance of good things in the dreamer’s life. Seeing geese for a married woman in In a dream, she remembers that she gave birth to a son. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream for a single woman? Seeing geese in a dream for a single woman indicates the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of goals. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream a lot of geese floating on the water, it indicates To a lot of goodness in her life, a good life and a prestigious job. If an unmarried girl sees goose feathers in a dream, it indicates the approach of her marriage, and seeing geese flying in the sky indicates her travels. See also: Interpretation of seeing stomach contractions in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream for a woman? Pregnant woman? If she sees in her dream a pregnant goose floating in the water, it indicates the approaching time of birth and an easy birth. If a pregnant woman sees white geese, it indicates the birth of a beautiful woman, as well as the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a goose in a dream for a married woman indicates abundance of sustenance and abundance of good and marital happiness. If a married woman sees a goose floating in her dream, it indicates good offspring and the fulfillment of desires and dreams. A dream about a young goose for a married woman indicates abundance of goodness and luxury of life. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon In a dream, what is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream for a divorced woman? A dream about a white goose indicates hearing good news, abundant livelihood, attaining a distinguished leadership position, and abundance of money. If a divorced woman sees geese floating in the water, it indicates comfort after fatigue and an abundance of goodness and nourishment in her life. If a divorced woman sees a black goose, it indicates problems and issues that she will face. What is the interpretation of a goose bite in a dream? Seeing a goose bite in a dream indicates that the dreamer is exposed to problems and troubles. Seeing a goose bite in a man’s dream indicates many problems and issues that he faces, as well as a large number of responsibilities. And the many requests from his wife and children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a tennis racket in a dream. What is the interpretation of young geese in a dream? A dream about a young goose in a dream

title: Interpretation of hair dye in a dream: Seeing hair dye in a dream

preview.html: The concept of changing hair color for single girls, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, single men, and married men. Seeing yellow, red, blonde, black, and white hair. Interpretation of a dream about hair dye in a dream. The connotations of seeing hair dye in a dream vary according to the shape of the hair, the color of the dye, the condition of the dreamer, and other details about the dream. Interpretation of a dream about hair dye by Ibn Sirini. Hair in a dream symbolizes sexual temptation, lust, vanity, and health. It also indicates your personality. Whoever sees that he is dyeing his hair, this is good news for a good and soon occasion. Whoever sees his hair dyed in a dream indicates a new life, happiness and joy, and it is said that it indicates marriage. Whoever sees that they are dyeing their hair a color different from their natural color knows that it will change from its nature to the worse depending on the color. The dye is light. According to your hair style, if it is easy to comb or tangle, and whoever saw in his dream that his hair was long-lived, whoever saw that his hair was curly will obtain a lot of goodness, and whoever saw that her hair was spoils, he will obtain glory and prestige. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing Blond hair: Whoever sees in a dream that he has dyed his hair, this is a good omen for him in the near future. When a person sees a man or woman who has dyed his hair blond, this is a sign of the evil eye and envy of those close to him, if he suffers from shortness of breath or frequent headaches before the vision. If not, then dyeing hair blond means comfort, or bringing joy or a pleasant surprise to the monarch, and it is said that it indicates illness and anxiety for those who abstain from worship or commit sins. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair black and seeing someone dyeing their hair black in a dream. This indicates the transition from one stage to another in his life, and also indicates a feeling of loneliness, and a large amount of black hair in a dream indicates strife and conflict with relatives or friends. Whoever dyes his hair black in a dream is a very busy person and confused in his behavior. Dyeing hair black in a dream indicates stability or loneliness and isolation for the pioneer. Therefore, whoever sees that he has dyed his hair black, even if his hair is black, he will move in his life to a new stage that may be... Happy if so. He is righteous in his religion, but he may be inclined to evil and become disturbed if he abstains from worship. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair brown. As for someone who dyes his hair brown in a dream, this indicates that he will acquire wealth, success, happiness, freedom, and long family relationships, and it also indicates fertility in the land. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair brown Red: As for dreaming of dyeing hair red in a dream, this indicates sensitivity to emotional ties and great love. It also indicates hatred, revenge, and anger. If the red dye is dark or in the form of a red rose, this indicates distress and confusion, and intense love for the two lovers. The color red indicates love. Passion and emotions, and whoever is happy with the color of red hair shows his love for those who are very close and will do good to him. As for someone who is not happy or finds himself disturbed by his own distress in...

title: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream: Fish are marine creatures that are distinguished by their diverse shapes and colors, and seeing them in a dream or grilled, as well as the social status of the viewer. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream: Seeing fish in a dream is generally a sign of success and distinction in the dreamer’s life and an indication of successful deals in a merchant’s dream. Seeing a fish in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will get a prestigious job from which she will earn a lot of money. A person who sees himself in a dream eating fish with a nice taste is one of the dreams that symbolizes the occurrence of some good positive transformations. If the dreamer is about to make a deal or... Agreement and saw a fish in his dream, this is a sign that he will achieve a lot of profits and gains. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Dreaming of a quantity of fish in the dreamer’s dream indicates achieving many material gains and living on a better social level, and if one sees that he is catching a fish in In a dream, this indicates happiness and joy in the coming period. A person who is going through some psychological crises, if he sees a fish in his dream, this is an indication of an improvement in his psychological state and a feeling of satisfaction and comfort in his life. A dreamer who sees himself in a dream eating a rotten, bad-tasting fish is one of the dreams. Which indicates that he will fall into many problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl, if she sees a fish in her dream, this is a sign that she will hear happy news in the near future. The dreamer who sees a large amount of fish in her dream is a sign of nourishment with A good husband who will achieve everything he wants. Seeing fish in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her strong ambition and pursuit of goals. A working woman, if she sees a fish in her dream, is a sign of promotion at work. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a woman fishing in a dream It is a sign of the arrival of goodness, livelihood, happiness and peace of mind. An insightful person who is going through some trials and problems in her life, when she sees a large amount of fish, this is a sign of the disappearance of worries and problems and life in stability. A woman who sees herself bringing fish to her family in a dream is one of the dreams that appear Her love for her husband and children and that she takes care of all their affairs so that they are in the best condition. The dreamer who sees a large amount of fish inside her house is a dream that indicates abundant wealth and this can be done through inheritance, trade or work. Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a pregnant womanFish in a dream about pregnancy It is a sign of childbirth in a short time. The dreamer who sees a small fish in his sleep is a sign of a healthy, nourished fetus. A pregnant woman who sees herself fishing in a dream is a sign that the birth process will be easy and that there will be no difficulties in it. A pregnant woman eating tasteless fish His is a sign that she is facing some health problems during pregnancy, but they soon disappear.Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a divorced womanThe divorced woman when she sees a fish in a dream

Interpretation of a dream about a house in Paradise in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a house in Paradise in a dream could be a sign that you You will reach a high position, and God knows the unseen. When a married man sees a house in Paradise in a dream, this may be evidence that he has reached a high position, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a house in Paradise in a dream, this may be evidence of a blessing from God, and God knows the unseen. The unseen. title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing electricity in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an opponent being electrocuted in a dream? It means the end of disputes and the beginning of peace. What is the purpose of seeing an electrical plug? This means that the dreamer has control over his lifestyle and his lifestyle is excellent. What is the interpretation of seeing a current and a spark going off without striking? This means that you You escaped a major problem. What is the point of seeing electricity if it shocked you because of screaming loudly? A guide to getting rid of worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing covered electrical wires? This means that you feel safe from fear and far from differences. Interpretation of seeing electricity in a dream. Interpretation of seeing electricity, specifically if a married man finds that His wife was electrocuted, it means that he loves her very much. If an opponent dreams of a dream about an electric shock, it means the end of disputes and the beginning of peace. Dreaming about having an electric plug means that the dreamer has excellent control over his lifestyle and lifestyle. Interpretation of a dream about electricity, a spark coming out of it, It means igniting strife and disagreements, and you are a part of it. Seeing a dream about electricity for a married woman. A dream about covered electrical wires means that you will feel safe from fear and away from arguments. If you were exposed to an electric shock, and a familiar person helped you, this means that you will escape from something bad because of that person. Interpretation of the vision Electricity and sparks coming out of it without hitting you means that you will escape from a major problem. If a married woman electrocutes herself in a dream, this means her desire to change her lifestyle. Interpretation of a dream about electricity and water: To dream that water is near a stream means problems that will escalate and reach their peak, You should be careful and behave well from now on. Water and electricity in a dream means that you are not good at managing your life and as a result of your wrong decisions, adversity will arise. A married man who finds water and electricity should treat his wife well and reconsider his relationship with those around him. Vision Dreaming about an electric shock: An electric shock in a dream is good and this means that there are enemies near you, such as business partners who are trying to destroy you or destroy bad partners. Here is the electric shock that warns you of the treachery of these people, and the electric shock may mean that you are on the path of deception and immorality or many sins as a result of backbiting. And gossiping and staying away from obedience. This shock alerts you to the need to approach God Almighty and seek forgiveness and forgiveness. Interpretation of seeing electricity: If you were shocked and you screamed loudly, it was said that it means comfort and the situation changes to satisfaction after anxiety. And if you see someone other than you who has been electrocuted, and this man is known to you, this means He needs your help. Interpretation of a dream about an electric spark: It is commendable in dreams to see an electric shock, but modern interpreters have found that a spark of electricity is not good. If a man dreams that a spark of electricity came out of the appliances or wires themselves, this means a disaster that he will fall into. Some said Interpreters in dreams mean illness, while others resort to the spark to mean problems
